message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $16,000 is already a very competitive price. To meet you halfway, I'd be willing to let it go for $14,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I am still unable to pay more than $10,000 for this product.
